doc.title: Da izberesh zhivota
doc.plot: World statistic ranks Bulgaria first in mortality due to heart attacks and brain strokes. The film familiarizes the spectators with the modern medical methods and their advantages for early diagnostic of artherothrombosis diseases; it focuses on different aspects of the problem. The spectators are free to chose, consider and analyze the options of leading Bulgarian specialists in the field of neurology and cardiology and to go through the personal experience of the story tellers in the film: Iossif Surchadzhiev, Rosaliya Bix, Ivan Kaydamov, and Emilia Radeva.
